trans-unit.source: Converts an integer to and from an object by applying the integer as an index to a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: 將整數轉換物件透過將整數做為索引套用至物件的清單。

trans-unit.source: You can use the AlternationConverter to bind a property to alternating values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 AlternationConverter 屬性繫結至替代值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you do the following: - Create an AlternationConverter and add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您想要項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>有替代藍色和淺藍色背景，您可以執行下列動作:-建立 AlternationConverter 並新增藍<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>和淺藍色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>至其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: - In a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>, bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and assign the converter you created to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -在<xref:System.Windows.Style>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>，繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>並指派您要建立的轉換器<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Converts an integer to an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> list.
trans-unit.target: 中的物件會將整數轉換<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>清單。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The integer to use to find an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> property.
trans-unit.target: 要用來尋找物件中的整數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結目標屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的轉換子參數。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換程式中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The object that is in the position of o modulo the number of items in .
trans-unit.target: 物件所在的位置 o 模數.中的項目數

trans-unit.source: Converts an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> list to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換中的物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>為整數的清單。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The object to find in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> property.
trans-unit.target: 中找不到物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結目標屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的轉換子參數。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換程式中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The index of o if it is in , or –1 if o does not exist in .
trans-unit.target: 索引 o 處於<> *>，則為-1，如果 o 不存在於<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> returns when an integer is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得一份物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref>傳回整數傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to bind a property to alternating values, the Values property contains the objects that are assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>屬性繫結至替代值，Values 屬性包含指派給屬性的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to Values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>若替代藍色和淺藍色背景，您將加入藍色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>和淺藍色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A list of objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> returns when an integer is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*> method.
trans-unit.target: 一份物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref>傳回整數傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>
